package.name: Horde_SyncML
package.summary: SyncML provides an API for processing SyncML requests.
package.description: This package provides classes for implementing a SyncML server.
package.notes: Make the SyncML package independant from Horde, provide a new Sql backend as a reference implementation for a backend.

release.notes: Passes all tests of SyncML conformance suite now.
Make the SyncML package independant from Horde, provide a new Sql backend as a reference implementation for a backend.
